reviews.review: We don't want fortnite kids in this game.
Um excelente jogo de RPG, boa movimentação, bons gráficos, etc...
man this game is fun but getting out of silver isnt. :)

bad game dont play

edit: still bad game

edit: uninstalled game
Acho que ainda não joguei o suficiente, mas parece bom!

People do not react kindly when you are trying to have fun during comps.

UPDATE: I have been reminded today how toxic the cs community is. As usual I screamed at the top of my lungs that enemies are pushing a ramp(for new users or users considering to download its a location on a map). I got muted by my teammates. Next which I see as even worse, my whole team was poor, so the kind soul I am, bought everyone a p250(the cheapest weapon in the game) sand dune and myself a m249(most expensive weapon in the game) and armor. They were upset, I do not understand how people can be so ungrateful.
One of the best FPS game in the world. Fun when playing with friends, and without.
pretty good, not much else to say really.
Is good game, most people not deuchbags
legal mais depois de um tempo perde a graça
greatest shooting game of all time

Si vous aimez les fps il pourrait très bien vous convenir une fois le prime obtenue pour éviter les nombreux cheater depuis que le jeu est gratuit.
A partir ce petit point je vous le recommande vraiment il est doté d'une bonne communauté qui vous plaira si vous essayer de la découvrir
Better get a new anti-cheat system
